Entries.Lucikiel0: I need to make a lot of changes to my lifestyle, and who better to start with than you?$l
Entries.Lucikiel1: Even when the world turns against us, I will always be on your side...$11

Entries.Lucikiel: I still can't wrap my mind around these human customs of yours. So this bunny apparently likes to lay eggs?$10#$e#Like it or not, there is a degree of truth hidden within every fairytale and legend.

These flowers overcome the harshness of winter with the emergence of spring. We must also live to fight another day.#$e#The closest you'll ever get to see me dancing is when I have a tango with death.$u
Clint told me to bring my favorite food and add it to the pot. So you're in luck, farmer. I'll grace you all with my refined palette.$h#$e#Hmmm~? I feel an angry stare at the back of my head.$u
Dangerous predators like to lurk in the dark, but these bioluminescent creatures hinder them from their prey.#$e#How fascinating...$u
I refined most of these ores with my mana. Clint will definitely snatch first or second place if there are no upsets.$u

My job is to warp anyone that's passed-out back outside the maze as a safety precaution.#$b#Relax. I'm monitoring everyone with the nearby will-o-wisps.$6#$e#It looks like the doctor found solace at one of the earlier hedges... Heh.$u
You like my ice sculpture? Notice how it looks like a frozen potato. I've sculpted it with your image in mind.$u#$e#You're welcome.$u
Take care of yourself, @. Because someone really cares about you.

I'm not really good at this whole undercover stuff.$2"/emote Clint 60/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "The problem is that everyone sees Lucikiel as a big scary demon, but he's different now. I've seen him change for the better.$s#$b#I thought if I took some pictures of Lucikiel clearing the mines, people would recognize how hard he works to keep us all safe from the monsters."/emote Clint 40/speak Clint "Emily calls it intuition, but I just have this feeling that I can trust you on this.$2"/faceDirection Clint 1/emote Clint 60/speak Clint "The truth is... I don't have any pictures of close friends. That's why I was looking forward to coming here today.#$b#I wasn't close to anyone before Lucikiel came.#$b#I just really wanted to take a few pictures with a friend. That way, I can prove to myself that I'm not some pathetic loner.$s"/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Thanks for listening to me. Lucikiel doesn't like having his picture taken anyway, so I should probably just call it a day.$s"/emote farmer 40/message "Have a photo shoot with Clint?"/question fork1 "#Yes. Take pictures with Clint.#No. Best to leave him alone."/fork SadClint/addConversationTopic BestFriends 5/faceDirection Clint 3/stopMusic/playMusic ragtime/jump Clint/emote Clint 16/speak Clint "You would really do that for me?$4"/emote farmer 32/speak Clint "Thank you, @.$1"/emote Clint 56 true/move Clint 0 3 2 false/move farmer 3 0 2 false/playSound sandyStep/addBigProp 47 36 106/pause 500/speak Clint "This is my very first time doing this, so let's just have some fun.$1#$b#I'll just set it to shoot on an interval timer so we have more to choose from. Entries.Lucikiel: I humbly accept your offering. You certainly know to appease me!$h/253 417 64 348/Hmm~? Are you accusing me of liking sweets? How bold of you./233 220 221 604 612 608 222 223 234/How bland. Is this your idea of a joke?/225 226/Let's pretend I never saw this.../168 171/How boring.//

Entries.LucikielRoom.1: A book titled 'The Solarion Chronicles'. The pages are worn out and filled with handwritten notes and annotations. ^On a bookmarked page, the word 'farmer' is circled a few times in red. ^Written beside it in neat tiny lettering is: ^'Yes, so true!!'
Entries.LucikielRoom.2: Water of an azure dragon flows from a mysterious source. Its healing properties cleanse and nourish the soul.
Entries.LucikielRoom.3: A potted plant gifted by Clint. Lucikiel waters it every single day.
Entries.LucikielRoom.4: A grimoire placed on a pedestal. I was told not to touch this.
Entries.LucikielRoom.5: Various potions from May's General Store: ^-Large EXP Bottle ^-Stamina Potion ^-Cursed Ruby Flask
Entries.LucikielRoom.6: Some artifacts scavenged from the Tower of Challenge.

Entries.LucikielArrives: Oh, @. You're the fourth person to check up on me today. I thought I was a goner after what happened, but I'm still alive... Haha.$2#$b#I never received so many guests before, so it's kind of flattering to see how all these people care about me.$s#$e#Lucikiel is scary, but he promised that he wouldn't harm me. This might sound crazy, and I was sort of panicking, but I might have made a deal with him and now he sort of liveswithmeunderthesameroof...?$2$2#$b#Oh no, I think I said too much! Uh-- I'll talk to you later, @! Thanks again for stopping by!$4
Entries.LucikielFriend: Thank you, @. You really didn't do much, but Lucikiel and I are lot closer than before. I think we cleared up a few misunderstandings.#$b#I'm grateful that Lucikiel chose to form a contract with me. I know it was more out of necessity, but it was lonely here before he came.$2#$e#He thought I wanted a master and subordinate relationship! First of all, he's too domineering to listen to someone like me! And I'd rather have a friend than a servant.$1#$b#Honestly, I'm just glad to have someone to talk to. We can even have sleepovers and talk about our deepest secrets...$5
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I'm so proud of Lucikiel. He finally started making new friends.$1#$b#He won't forget me anytime soon, and it's good to see that he's finally getting the recognition he deserves.$1
Entries.Rehabilitation: You did something, didn't you? Lucikiel smiles a lot more around the smithy... It's kind of blinding actually.$4#$b#It's like a huge weight was lifted off his chest. I know he was struggling with something from his past, but he deserves to be happy.$h
Entries.GoodEnd: I'm so glad you managed to cheer him up, @! But did you know what Lucikiel did when I was gone?$1#$b#He ended our contract without letting me know! He was prepared to leave me behind without even saying goodbye. The nerve of him!$3#$b#We managed to renew the contract so he can stay here though. The next time he tries to run off without saying anything... I-$1#$b#%Clint suddenly breaks down into tears. He's an emotionally confused sobbing wreck.
Entries.BadEnd: @! You're here!$4#$b#I was so mad that Lucikiel ended our contract without even saying anything! It just wouldn't feel the same without him.$3#$b#For some reason, Lucikiel showed up all battered and bruised. He's fine now, but...$2#$b#There's just a few things that are bothering me... He kept muttering something about a wizard.#$b#Also... @, I don't think Lucikiel remembers you. I'm sorry.$2
Entries.ManaL: I saw the video that Shane uploaded! You guys were amazing!$h#$b#I'm not much of a fighter, but I'll be here to upgrade your tools. It's the least I can do for our valley's protectors.$h#$e#I know he visits every week, but tell Lucikiel I said 'Hi!'$5
Entries.BestFriends: I hung up most of the pictures we took in my room. Lucikiel gets flustered whenever he sees them.$h#$b#Guess who finally has the upperhand, haha!$5

Entries.Rehabilitation: All of my life had been for the sake of power and enacting my revenge. It's been so long that I had forgotten how to feel.$s#$b#My chest... It hurts, and I don't understand why. I don't know what you did to me, but for some reason, I don't hate it.$s
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Your presence confounds me, @.$s#$b#Your work as a farmer seems tedious. And yet you toil away, seeming so satisfied with life.$s#$b#You have no thirst for power nor recognition, or hold any sort of ambition to rise beyond your station... Yet everyone seems to adore you.$10#$b#Tell me, @... how does someone as simple as you achieve all of 'that'?$10
Entries.GoodEnd: Hey, @.$l#$b#Thank you for always being there for me. You're my lucky star that guides me out of the dark.$l#$b#You're also pretty adorable after getting teased. Feel free to waltz back into my arms anytime.$u
Entries.BadEnd: Oh. It's the farmer.#$b#I work at Clint's smithy. We upgrade tools and process ores.#$b#...$9#$b#I don't know why, but something about you feels very familiar...$10
Entries.KingsRaid: Come to the beach tomorrow morning. I promise to show you something fun.$h#$e#I'll even share with you a part of my powers.$u
Entries.ManaL: Don't forget that we formed a contract together. One that is more powerful than any other in the world.$u#$e#Must I remind you? It was a sacred promise formed by the power of our love. Because of it, I am able to share a small portion of my powers with you at anytime.$l
Entries.BestFriends: Clint has been getting on my nerves lately. He's keeps rambling on about making a scrapbook.#$b#He also starts giggling nonstop whenever he steps into his room... I really don't want to know.$10#$b#Though, I've ever seen Clint this happy before. I might as well let him savor these moments.$h
Entries.MarriedToToshinori: Congratulations on your marriage. Life becomes much more precious when you have someone to protect.$u
Entries.ToshisPTSD: I've seen that cold hardened look in his eyes before. Those are the eyes of a survivor.#$e#Sometimes, the past never stops hurting... but the pain is proof that we are alive.$s
Entries.ToshiAndGeorge: I honestly don't see what all the fuss is about.#$e#So Toshinori is queer. So what? We demons stay true to our heart's desires. We gotta love what we love, right?$u
Entries.ToshinorisDeathScene: I had forgotten how human lives are so fragile. Toshinori... He died just as quietly as he lived.$s#$e#Rest in peace, Toshinori.
Entries.JasperHomeA: Professor Jasper went into the mines, didn't he... He's lucky to came back in mostly one piece.#$b#First it was those kids, and now it's our esteemed professor! Why does everyone ignore the blatant warnings of the Adventurer's Guild?$10
Entries.JulietGremlin: That Juliet picked up a rather territorial companion. Her dog kept barking at Clint and chased him up a tree earlier.$u#$b#I've never seen Clint run so fast. I also never had to help a grown man come down from a tree before...$10#$e#She must have picked up my scent on Clint. Dogs are more susceptible to my kind, whether we like it or not... Maybe someday we'll get along.

Entries.Rehabilitation: Hopefully this will put an end to his path of destruction. He hates me for this, but I don't regret my decision.#$b#He was something else entirely a hundred years ago. A terrible monster. The witch and I  had to pool our powers together to seal him away.#$e#Perhaps it was for the best. He was not the only one at fault, but nothing is ever justifiable during a war.#$b#Beware of the man who speaks in hands. And avoid those who slither in the dark, @.
Entries.GoodEnd: The Gear of Apocalypse has stopped revolving. Balance is finally restored to the valley.#$b#Are you curious about the doomed cycle? As protector of the valley, it is my job to defend this land.#$b#The Gear of Apocalpyse began with a blood red moon appearing over the Calico Desert, turning creatures and monsters insane. It eventually spread to the rest of the valley.#$b#The blood red moon appears once in every hundred years, but the next one was supposed to show up just a while ago.#$b#I wonder what happened...
Entries.BadEnd: So you visited him. It would seem that Lucikiel has selective memory loss.#$b#His memory of you pained him so greatly that he had to remove it, otherwise he would have gone insane.#$b#I'm not sure where he was sent to receive such injuries, but he's lucky to come back in one piece.#$b#I healed most of his injuries with the help of the forest spirits. But I couldn't recover the rest of his memories, sadly.
Entries.ManaL: I heard that Lucikiel crafted a magic doll in my image and encouraged you all to destroy it.#$b#...A part of me is very concerned. Haaa, I'm growing too old for this.

Entries.LucikielArrives: I can't believe it. That arrogant money grubber actually tried to summon a demon here to brainwash us all!$3#$e#Morris... Just what in Yoba has gotten into you?$2
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I can't say I'm pleased that my daughter is taking magic lessons, or whatever you call it. But she's a lot happier nowadays.#$b#It's a lot safer than her being unsupervised in the middle of the night.$1

Entries.LucikielArrives: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I hope she doesn't get any crazy ideas...#$b#We already have one demon on the loose. I don't think we can handle another.$2#$e#I'm not so sure where her fascination comes from.
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Abigail thinks that we haven't noticed, but we know she's been sneaking out of the house early in the morning.#$b#It reminds me of when Pierre and I were younger.$1

Entries.LucikielArrives: I thought I saw my life flashing before my eyes.$2#$b#It was in that moment, I realized there was so much left to do in the world. Words remain unspoken in a book I still have yet to fulfill.
Entries.ManaL: I cannot get that battle out of my head. I had never seen such raw feelings and passion laid out before me.#$b#I still need to document my feelings. My thoughts are scattled all over the place right now, but I will engrave those moments in my memory.$h

Entries.LucikielArrives: That demon... I've seen that cold hardened look in his eyes before. Those are the eyes of a survivor.#$e#People are afraid of the unknown, and they don't feel comfortable around a wild man like me.$2#$b#Perhaps that demon and I have a few things in common.$1
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Lucikiel is becoming more accepted by the community. Perhaps I would also fit in somehow...

Entries.LucikielArrives: When I moved out of the city to become an artist, I never thought I would experience something like this.$2#$b#I don't regret my decision. Sometimes life is about the journey, and not the destination. That's the source of my inspiration.
Entries.ManaL: So I heard you guys are being called the 'Stardew Valley Raiders.' The defenders of Pelican Town that will protect us from the forces of evil.#$b#What a strange sounding name, but it's oddly fitting. Mhm, I think I can work with this.$7#$b#%Leah starts muttering about which types of brushes she should use.

Entries.LucikielArrives: You've got to be kidding me... I chipped a nail earlier from that incident!$2#$e#Ugh, this is seriously the worst.$11
Entries.ManaL: I took a lot of good pictures during that training session. Shane asked me for some copies so he could upload them online.#$b#No need to worry, I've had a lot of practice! I captured all the perfect highlights at just the right angles.$h#$e#Now people will see how glorious you all were. You're welcome.

Entries.LucikielArrives: I don't know why, but my body just wouldn't move when that big scary guy appeared out of nowhere!$7#$e#I don't know how to put it, but I don't think he's as bad as everyone is making him out to be...$3
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Lucikiel is helping me learn how to control my mana!$h#$b#I want to learn how to shoot lasers from my eyes, but he's making me stick to my flute for now.
Entries.ManaL: Argh, that liar! Lucikiel told us those dolls had the battle strength of a few slimes... He obviously wanted us to lose! That battle had major boss-level vibes!$a#$b#But... we still managed beat it though, thanks to your help. We make an epic team, @. We're getting stronger, I can feel it!$h

Entries.LucikielArrives: The stunt that Joja tried to pull off in the town square was a rude awakening. I really know how to pick my employers, huh.$2#$e#*Sigh* My head is still ringing from before.$5#$b#S'ok. I've had worse migraines in the past.$2
Entries.ReputationIncreased: That new song is all right. I asked Gus to put it in the jukebox.
Entries.ManaL: This is insane! The video I uploaded surpassed a million views within just a few hours!$1#$e#A lot of people think it's edited footage, but I honestly left it as it was.$6

Entries.LucikielArrives: It's sad that Jas and Vincent were there to see all of that. They're too young to understand what happened.$s#$b#Maybe a trip to the playground would help take it off their minds.
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I sometimes see Lucikiel in the library when it's raining. You really can't judge a book by its cover!$h#$b#I wonder if he's good with kids...
Entries.ManaL: I almost couldn't believe my eyes. The four of you looked just like the heroes mentioned in our history books.#$b#Jas and Vincent are learning about the founders of Pelican Town, and you bear a striking resemblance to one of them. He was a farmer, just like you.

Entries.LucikielArrives: What a dangerous world we live in, kid.$2#$e#I had my own run-ins with danger in the past, but who would'a thought I'd have a demon as a drinking buddy? Haha!$1
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I always knew he was an okay fella! Someone who can hold their drink like that is okay in my books!

Entries.LucikielArrives: Vincent keeps asking if he can sleep in my room. He's afraid that the big bad demon might appear under his bed.$2#$b#Mom used to read us bedtime stories about demons eating naughty kids at night... I thought it was just a fairy tale!$8
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Our new song was a hit! I showed it to my family and Vincent was really happy.$h#$b#Now he sort of wants Lucikiel to appear under his bed.
Entries.ManaL: I'm able to shoot lightning bolts with my electric guitar. Cool, right?$h#$b#I'll be able to take down enemies with the power of music!$h

Entries.LucikielArrives: I knew something was up when I saw Morris waving around that artifact.$5#$b#That blacksmith might have saved us all...$2
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Lucikiel found out that Sam and I play Solarion Chronicles.#$b#He said he wants to show us something when it's fall. He had this strange look on his face... I don't know if I should be concerned.$s
Entries.ManaL: Lucikiel helped me unlock my mana, but I don't want to talk about it.#$b#...My power is kind of embarassing. I wasn't in that sparring session earlier for a reason.$2#$e#Is this payback for all the times I beat Sam at pool?#$b#...Nah.$7#$e#Ugh, fine. My power involves a transformation and the color pink.$5#$e#Are you happy now?

Entries.LucikielArrives: I'm still shaking... I've felt that evil presence before, back when I was a little girl.$2#$b#I never thought I would see 'it' again. The awful demon that destroyed my town...$2#$e#Oh George... what's going to happen to us?$2
Entries.ReputationIncreased: So the prophecy might have been false. The scales of balance might be restored...

Entries.LucikielArrives: Something has been bothering my wife lately, and I don't like it. She's been more absent-minded than usual.#$b#Maybe we should make a surprise visit to the clinic.$2
*Hic.*$s#$b#%Vincent has a case of the hiccups.
Entries.ReputationIncreased: My big brother is the best! Sam beat the bad guy and made him into his friend!$1#$b#%Somewhere else in town, Sam starts sneezing erratically.

Entries.LucikielArrives: I'm worried about Clint. I visited him earlier, but it looked like there was something on his mind.$3#$b#Poor guy. I wish there was something I could do to make him feel better.$2
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Lucikiel is a regular here, but he was very guarded when we first met.#$b#He smiles a lot more often now too! I sometimes want to wipe that smug smirk off his face, but it's a pleasant change.$h
Entries.ManaL: I already have my mana unlocked, apparently. Lucikiel called me 'receptive.'#$b#I didn't know this phenomenon was called mana. It's a matter of different names, I guess. I've always been sensitive to positive and negative energy ever since I was young...$3

Entries.LucikielArrives: Have you heard of the tale of the Golden-Eyed Demon?#$e#Long ago, humans and demonfolk used to live together in peace. But everything changed when the Gotoro Empire attacked...#$e#The elemental wars have raged for more than a hundred years. The golden eyes sweeped through the battlefield, claiming lives in the span of a butterfly's wingbeat.#$b#There was a prophecy that when the Golden-Eyed demon remakes his appearance, the gears of apocalpyse would turn once again...
In all my years, I've never had a customer as daunting as that demon. But some things just never change.#$b#No matter what life throws at you, a warm plate of food with some cold beer always helps!$1
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I'm good at judging a person's character. I would label Lucikiel as someone with a weary soul.#$b#I should offer him one of my specialty drinks. On the house! He spends time with those kids here on Friday nights, after all.

Entries.LucikielArrives: I-Is he gone yet? We received a mighty influx of visitors, but they're all scared of that demon.$6#$b#A tablespoon of honey everyday along with an all-milk diet make good remedies for hysteria.
Entries.ManaL: This is absolutely remarkable! My mana can enhance the natural regneration of people.$h#$b#A small scrape on the knee can be healed within a matter of seconds. If I do this right, I might even be able to save more lives...

Entries.LucikielArrives: That JojaMart representative mentioned something about summoning... Does that mean there are beings from other dimensions?$2#$e#This could lead to a tremendous breakthrough in my research! I need to learn more about the lifeforms from these alternate planes!$4
Entries.ManaL: I unlocked my mana too. My power isn't orientated for combat though.$3#$b#I'm not exactly sure what it does yet... However, my inventions have been blowing up a lot less recently. Practically zero explosions!$h

Entries.LucikielArrives: I'm just glad that everyone is safe. It's good that everyone can go back to business as usual.$h
The local animals have been more skittish as of late.$5#$b#This supports the theory that animals can sense negative energy or tell when something is wrong. It's astonishing to see it in person.$2
For some reason, Clint put in a request for Lucikiel to be registered as a citizen of Pelican Town.$2#$e#What have we gotten ourselves into?
I hope everyone is okay. That spectacle had poor Jas all frightened! Even our animals were spooked!$3
Miss Penny said that we should still go to school.$3#$b#I'm a little scared, but Vincent said he would protect me from that bad guy.$s
I wish my husband was here, but he's out there fighting for our safety.$2#$b#It's up to me to protect our sons while he's away from home!$4#$b#Now... where's my frying pan?$1

Did you see that demon? His arms were twice as big as mine!#$b#Not to brag, but I have a good eye for these kinds of things. I don't know what he does, but his work really shows!$h#$e#I might have been doing things wrong this whole time... I should probably add fifty more sets to my routine just to be safe.$5
Entries.ReputationIncreased: Lucikiel took one look at my training regimen and said that I was going to ruin all my hard work this way.$2#$b#On the bright side, he's offered to train me when he's not busy. We'll be working out at the gym on weekends during winter.
Entries.ManaL: I've been following Lucikiel's workout regimen, and I can really see the results!$h#$b#My throwing arm has been getting a lot stronger too. I could probably lift you up with one arm.

Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Lucikiel: Hmm... Very well. You've piqued my interest, so I can at least grace you with my presence.$u
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Lucikiel: Are you asking me out on a date? Well, I'd love to go with you.$h#$e#I'll meet you at the theater, babe.$u

Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Lucikiel: Hmm... Very well. You've piqued my interest, so I can at least grace you with my presence.$u
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Lucikiel: Are you asking me out on a date? Well, I'd love to go with you.$h#$e#I'll meet you at the theater, babe.$u

BeforeMovie.Text: Do you know why saplings are special? They start off weak, but they have the potential to grow into large, unwavering trees.

AfterMovie.Text: Ahem, that somewhat appealed to my tastes. The hope of life is a touching theme.$u

BeforeMovie.Text: A movie about a video game? What a strange concept.$9

AfterMovie.Text: I am so lost. Humans come up with really bizarre stuff.$10

DuringMovie.Text: Ha! This is supposed to be mysterious?$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was hilarious. Eternal solitude is much more terrifying.$u

BeforeMovie.Text: I heard this movie is supposed to be really emotional.

AfterMovie.Text: Sorry. I'm not really into sappy movies like that.
